content: हरणं [हृ-भावे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Seizing, taking. {@--2@} Carrying away, carrying off, removing, stealing; कन्याहरणं <ls>Ms. 3. 33</ls>, <ls>R. 11. 74.</ls> {@--3@} Depriving of, destroying; as in प्राणहरणं. {@--4@} Dividing. {@--5@} A gift to a student. {@--6@} The arm. {@--7@} Semen virile. {@--8@} Gold. {@--9@} A nuptial present. (= यौतक <ab>q. v.</ab>) {@--10@} A shell, cowrie {@--11@} Boiling water.
